name: Easy Gallery Management – ( Password protected, Masonary layout, Share and download gallery image )
author: ViitorCloud

sections.description:
First free plugin which provides functionality to display gallery with password protected feature, masonary layout, share and download gallery image on social media using easy gallery management plugin.

Plugin Functionality:
1) Easy gallery setup from backend
2) Create gallery by following below steps:
=> Create gallery from gallery menu from wordpress backend
=> Add [easygallerylist] shortcode in any post or page

For a back-end live demo without download, visit demo

Get Involved

ViitorCloud believes in an active community support so with such plugins we try to make life easy for developers & of course customers. Don’t forget to subscribe our newsletter.
sections.installation:
1) Upload Easy Gallery Management to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2) Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Plugin Supports:

=> This plugin includes a functionality to display gallery with masonary layout, open image in slider
=> This plugin includes a functionality to share image on social media, download image, zoom in zoom out image, copy image
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.
